lyrics.stanza: Lord, there's nothing in this world like You; You fill me up completely. And I would never give You up for anything Because nothing else could satisfy me so.
People think that they can find Satisfaction, peace of mind. Everything leads to another, But I've found the best.
No more trying something else, Or thinking that there's something more; No more hoping "someday," 'Cause today I have the best.
Looking not at failures past, Hoping not in future dreams; Not wishing I were different, Knowing everything's the best.
